headline: A Fresh Look at Johnson Controls (JCI) Valuation After Strong Earnings, Guidance, and Analyst Optimism
summary: Johnson Controls International (JCI) just released its fiscal 2025 results, showing clear revenue and net income growth, as well as an encouraging order backlog and improved cash flow. Management also outlined optimistic guidance for fiscal 2026. See our latest analysis for Johnson Controls International. Johnson Controls International’s upbeat earnings, sustainability innovations, and record backlog have powered impressive momentum, with a 16.1% 1-month share price return and year-to-date...

headline: November Technology Portfolio Launches With Insights From Apple, PepsiCo, Vodafone, and Johnson Controls
summary: The November editions of BizClik’s Technology portfolio are now live, featuring fresh insights from AI Magazine, Technology Magazine, Telco Magazine and Data Centre Magazine. This month’s issues spotlight global leaders, breakthrough technologies and the strategies shaping the future of AI, data and digital infrastructure. London - 11 November 2025 - BizClik, a global B2B media and events company, has released the latest magazine editions of its Technology portfolio, featuring: Technology Magazi
